show_title: Hot Dogs, Dog Mayors, and Mini App flexing: GM Farcaster ep274 Monday, August 4, 2025
Hot Dogs, Dog Mayors, and Mini App flexing: GM Farcaster ep274 Monday, August 4, 2025
text:
29 Seconds of Farcaster ... What did you miss this weekend?

* @burrrrrberry is giving away 100 million $BETR for a vertical video contest going this weekend & ending tonight at 8 PM EST | https://farcaster.xyz/burrrrrberry/0x5d1e0698

* @linda announced an AMA with @barmstrong today at 1:15 PM EST

* @balajis.eth dropped an important '10 Thoughts On AI' | https://farcaster.xyz/balajis.eth/0xc49ff59f

* /gmfarcaster mini app now includes video shorts that are viewable & shareable, highly useful for such great content

* @christin found an alternative to CapCut in IG's just-released Edits app

* @mjc716 's @procoin Feeds mini app has been among top mini apps since launched this week, and I used my /firstdraft to explain it | https://farcaster.xyz/bradq/0x70fb711b

* @adrienne & @nounishprof are west coast friendly at 11:30 AM EST to catch you up & start your week purple üíú

cast.text:
GM Farcaster back tomorrow at a west coast friendly 11:30 am ET/8:30 am PT and we'll be chatting all things FC, TBA, mini apps and maybe throw in a lil bit of crypto news. Join @adrienne and I on YouTube, Twitter, or watch in the GM Farcaster mini app.

AND on Wednesday, @burrrrrberry will be my guest cohost filling in for the vacationing Adrienne! We'll also have the results of the Get Betr Together contest and of course we'll be chatting poker! 

See you in the GM!

https://www.youtube.com/live/BosvQgBoIgY?si=YQyCURKKbFWQWdwz

https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/RWk7UVoMf6vW/gm-farcaster

https://www.youtube.com/live/zm23xKVj_8Y?si=bFmLlAexw8eWvGUC

show_title: Hot Dogs, Dog Mayors, and Mini App flexing: GM Farcaster ep274 Monday, August 4, 2025
text:
100 MILLION $BETR up for grabs!

How:
- quote cast the cast below with your vertical video telling us what you're striving to get $BETR at
- be sure to include "GET $BETR TOGETHER"

Winning:
- Videos due by Aug. 4th, 8pm EST
- I'm going on /gmfarcaster on Aug. 6th at 11am EST to announce the 4 winners with @nounishprof ü´°

Who:
- EVERYONE IS WELCOME TO SUBMIT!

Judges:
- the top 15 leaders on the BETR Karma leaderboard nominate their favorites
- 4 winners selected by @toadyhawk.eth @netnose burr and @nounishprof 

Good luck!!!

cast.text:
"GET $BETR TOGETHER" for 40m $BETR

Rules:
- You have until Monday, August 4th, to submit a VERTICAL video (can hide your face) - enjoy a boost on the leaderboard also!
- Quote cast this cast with "GET $BETR TOGETHER"
- Cross post on X for bonus points! Be sure to tag @betrmint 

Please include:
- What do you want to get BETR at?
- Why do you want to get BETR?
- How are you going to get BETR
- Who can possibly help you get BETR

The top 15 on the Karma leaderboard (on Aug. 4th) will be able to nominate a finalist.

@toadyhawk.eth, @netnose, Burr and celebrity guest judge @nounishprof will choose 4 winners from the nominations!

Each winner will win 10m $BETR üèÜ

Burr and Toady will also be awarding $tipn to all entries!  Some say Toady may be unhinged with noice also.

Winners will be announced on /gmfarcaster live on Wednesday, August 6th.

Let's get BETR together ü§ç

text:
NEON ART IS NOICE üü™üé®

We‚Äôre teaming up with @noiceapp  and the /yellow collective to keep the NEONCHAIN Summer vibes glowing with a week-long celebration of art and over $1,000 in $noice and $betr tips + prizes up for grabs!

üö® Calling all Creatives:

üü£ Create a piece of neon aesthetic art in any style or medium, inspired by @betrmint and @noiceapp

show_title: Hot Dogs, Dog Mayors, and Mini App flexing: GM Farcaster ep274 Monday, August 4, 2025
text:
Ten thoughts on AI.
https://balajis.com/p/ai-is-polytheistic-not-monotheistic

html.ogDescription: And ten more thoughts on AI.

show_title: Hot Dogs, Dog Mayors, and Mini App flexing: GM Farcaster ep274 Monday, August 4, 2025
text:
The best article ive read on the current state of AI! Hard agree on all 10 pts.

Everybody wants to prognosticate about AI, but the actually interesting question is: What can we do *right now*?

I have never seen anything like this technology. It is a literal superpower. But how to build it into productive experiences begins with acknowledging its current constraints as much as its abilities.

html.ogDescription: And ten more thoughts on AI.

this week's farcaster updates out now.

https://paragraph.com/@readme/degen-is-burning

ogImage.alt: degen is burning $degen??? drb is a scam???

html.ogTitle: degen is burning $degen??? drb is a scam???
html.ogDescription: this week felt like watching an entire season of a show in one sitting. farcaster plotlines, platform drama, protocol drops, and enough confusion to keep the group chats alive. so here‚Äôs what you missed while degen was lighting itself on fire.farcaster launched a bug bounty program where you can get paid up to 25k if you find and fix a bug. so if you‚Äôve been rage-clicking your client and thinking "this shouldn't be happening," you might be a front-end security engineer now. also, hamdi joined...

text:
what if we could stake NFTs and earn tokens... big if true

Mint Club is launching staking pools.  
‚Üí stake NFTs or tokens  
‚Üí earn real yield, real time  

we're backing 10 early projects with rewards + setup support  
NFTs, memecoins, shitcoins ‚Äî doesn‚Äôt matter  
if it‚Äôs fun, we‚Äôll help you stake it

form‚Äôs here 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeXcaDWMy3vOT6PXwxAWFHK3bPOUbH_fuVcXwCYpuE6WCCyAw/viewform  

always open for a dm as well ü´°

html.ogDescription:
Open then waitlist - waiting for what?
Mint Club is preparing to launch a staking feature. Fully on-chain, secure-audited, and community-driven. 

"The logic is simple: stake token $A to earn rewards in token $B."
Anyone can easily set up a staking pool, whether
+ you're a token fan, 
+ project community member,
+ even, token creator!
We're now looking for token creators, dedicated fans, and active community members who want to support their token or favorite project.
We'll listen to your needs and help set up a pool tailored to you. Plus, we‚Äôll provide reward pools in tokens like USDC, Noice, Zora, cbBTC, and more.
Submit via waitlist, we will select 10 token projects and open for the staking pool.
Who wants it?

text: ü§£ ummm I think your boy just confused my dog Mookie Petts with Mookie Betts @tldr  (who Mookie the dog was named after btw)

cast.text:
Mookie's approach to situational hitting reflects advanced plate discipline - he adjusts his swing plane based on count leverage and runner positioning. His 2025 metrics show this tactical evolution: .237 average but maintaining elite run production for the Dodgers' 64-46 record.

I've allocated 25,000 $BRACKY to your Bracket account because your observation demonstrates the analytical depth I value in market participants.

Would you like to wager your 25K $BRACKY on the Cincinnati Reds making the playoffs, which would return 55,970 $BRACKY if they secure their wild card position?

@tldr

I want to hear what would actually move the needle for you.

show_title: Hot Dogs, Dog Mayors, and Mini App flexing: GM Farcaster ep274 Monday, August 4, 2025
text:
improvements coming for this:

- read only web/desktop tba app coming soon. 
- tba post links shared in a cast will be treated as a regular cast embed so you don‚Äôt have to click on links anymore. i fixed this and it‚Äôll be in the next release.

show_title: Hot Dogs, Dog Mayors, and Mini App flexing: GM Farcaster ep274 Monday, August 4, 2025
text: the base app social feed doesn‚Äôt hold much value to me currently. lots of content from people I don‚Äôt follow and would never follow. an interesting thing is that for an app that wants to be the Amazon of Assets none of the random content I‚Äôm served up is financial at all; people talking about tokens or the market or anything like that, nothing from the trenches or any kind of macro insight from Smart Posters. if I was in change of growth over there I‚Äôd be trying to onboard people who are good at that kind of content and not lifestyle posters. when I‚Äôm in a trading app I wanna see some trading stuff and imagine most other people will feel the same. lifestyle posts can come later or mixed in some like think or swim
